about_the_game:
- A Light-hearted Comedy
The adventures of Dr. Murph are light-hearted comedies. A mixture of irony and absurdism can be found in each mission he goes on.



- High Quality Cartoon Art
The cartoon art style brings something fresh to fans of adult gaming, with cute characters and sexy animations.
- Attractive Characters
The game is filled with a plethora of women! You can establish relationships and have sex with most of them!
- Alluring Animations
The game has animated sex scenes! Bonus features such as x-ray observation, changing of speed, and other customisation options are also included!



-Multiversal Missions
As you cross galaxies and dimensions, each mission will have its own unique character, distinct story, and (occasionally) links to other missions. The main quest throughout the game will remain the relationship between Repa and Dr. Murph.
- Post-game Content
Completing the main story will unlock new content including: additional events, new characters, new missions, and alternate costumes!



- A Freeplay Sandbox
As you progress through the game you will unlock portals, allowing you to quickly return to planets you previously visited!
With few exceptions, you are free to have a relationship with whomever you want, whenever you want!



- Erotic Minigames and Puzzles
The game is filled with erotic mini-games with beautiful women! Most of the minigames are designed to further the ongoing narrative, and make sex scenes more interactive!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game features Adults Only content ( 18+ ) in the form of sexual content between consenting adults, both in human and alien form. 
It features themes like BJ, vaginal and anal intercourse, both straight and lesbian.

name: Dr. Murph

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor (i3 or equivalent)
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor (i3 or equivalent)
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: Embark on an erotic intergalactic adventure with the clumsy Dr. Murph and his hot assistant, Repa. Meet other women from a myriad of alien races - and, if you plays your cards right, you might just end up getting lucky!
